translation: Those cruel haters, the worst among men in the world, I hurl those evil-doers into the wombs of demons only.
commentary: 16.19 tan those? I'm I? hating (the) hating (ones)? Cruel cruel? in the worlds in the worlds? Naradhaman worst among men? I throw (I) hurl? Ajasram for ever? Evil evildoers? in the demons of demons? Eve only? in wombs in wombs.Commentary Now listen to the manner in which I deal with all these demoniacal persons who injure people and who take delight in killing people and animals and who hate Me? the indweller
